answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Dan, 
You might be looking for ICMA-RC. If so, you'll find them at www.icma-rc.org or by calling 1-800-669-7400. (Although they are affiliated, ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.)
